question: Which of the following Airport awarded the National Tourism Awards 2015-16, in New Delhi?
option2: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose International Airport
explanation: Srinagar International Airport, Jammu & Kashmir and Swami Vivekananda Airport, Raipur, Chhattisgarh were jointly awarded the National Tourism Awards 2015-16, in New Delhi. This is the first time, two airports have been jointly selected as best airports for their innovative style of functioning, pro-environment initiatives and passenger friendly approach.
